name: Little Sister (Pc)
description: 《Little Sister》 is a combination of cooperation and competition. 3D Xian Xia burns to RPG masterpieces. The five major attributes are infinite national war. Here you will start a thrilling journey of enshrined spirits, and together with the younger sisters, embark on the revitalization of Shiyu. Inspirational journey! Defeat the five-border boss to become the hope of the spirit of the world, Shaoxia! For the future of the Five Realms, release the bloody soul!
